mapper.select: select mpi.* from monitor_img mpi left join monitor_device md on mpi.device_id = md.id where md.device_serial = #{deviceSerial} order by mpi.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_img (create_time, update_time, path, illegal_type, device_id) values (#{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{path}, #{illegalType}, (select id from monitor_device where device_serial = #{deviceSerial}))
